error_code.description: An error code, if the transaction failed.

error_description.description: A description of the error, if the transaction failed.

BlockchainGenericAccount.description:
The account address on the blockchain.
Typically, it is a string of alphanumeric characters, encoded in SS58 format.

UINT128.description:
Numeric value, presented as plain number or string

`min`: 0  
`max`: 340282366920938463463374607431768211455

BlockchainGenericBalance.description: The balance, represented as a numeric value.

Record_string.AnyJson_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

BalancesTransferAllowDeathArgs.description:
Arguments required to Transfer some liquid free balance to another account.

`dest`

`value`

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

BalancesTransferKeepAliveArgs.description:
Arguments required to Same as the [`transfer_allow_death`] call, but with a check that the transfer will not

`dest`

`value`

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

BalancesTransferAllArgs.description:
Arguments required to Transfer the entire transferable balance from the caller account.

`dest` - The recipient of the transfer.

`keepAlive`

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed
The type of transaction to be performed

UINT32.description: Numeric value, presented as plain number

BlockchainGenericId.description:
A unique identifier (Asset, Collection, Agent).
Typically, it is a numeric value.

AssetsStartDestroyArgs.description:
Arguments required to Start the process of destroying a fungible asset class.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsDestroyAccountsArgs.description:
Arguments required to Destroy all accounts associated with a given asset.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsDestroyApprovalsArgs.description:
Arguments required to Destroy all approvals associated with a given asset up to the max (T::RemoveItemsLimit).

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsFinishDestroyArgs.description:
Arguments required to Complete destroying asset and unreserve currency.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be destroyed. This must identify an existing asset.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsMintArgs.description:
Arguments required to Mint assets of a particular class.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to have some amount minted.

`beneficiary` - The account to be credited with the minted assets.

`amount` - The amount of the asset to be minted.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to have some amount minted.

beneficiary.description: The account to be credited with the minted assets.

amount.description: The amount of the asset to be minted.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsBurnArgs.description:
Arguments required to Reduce the balance of `who` by as much as possible up to `amount` assets of `id`.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to have some amount burned.

`who` - The account to be debited from.

`amount` - The maximum amount by which `who`'s balance should be reduced.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to have some amount burned.

who.description: The account to be debited from.

amount.description: The maximum amount by which `who`'s balance should be reduced.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsTransferArgs.description:
Arguments required to Move some assets from the sender account to another.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

`target` - The account to be credited.

`amount` - The amount by which the sender's balance of assets should be reduced and `target`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the sender balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

amount.description: The amount by which the sender's balance of assets should be reduced and `target`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the sender balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsTransferKeepAliveArgs.description:
Arguments required to Move some assets from the sender account to another, keeping the sender account alive.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

`target` - The account to be credited.

`amount` - The amount by which the sender's balance of assets should be reduced and `target`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the sender balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

amount.description: The amount by which the sender's balance of assets should be reduced and `target`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the sender balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsForceTransferArgs.description:
Arguments required to Move some assets from one account to another.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

`source` - The account to be debited.

`dest` - The account to be credited.

`amount` - The amount by which the `source`'s balance of assets should be reduced and `dest`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the `source` balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to have some amount transferred.

amount.description: The amount by which the `source`'s balance of assets should be reduced and `dest`'s balance increased. The amount actually transferred may be slightly greater in the case that the transfer would otherwise take the `source` balance above zero but below the minimum balance. Must be greater than zero.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsFreezeAccountArgs.description:
Arguments required to Disallow further unprivileged transfers of an asset `id` from an account `who`. `who`

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

`who` - The account to be frozen.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsThawAccountArgs.description:
Arguments required to Allow unprivileged transfers to and from an account again.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

`who` - The account to be unfrozen.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsFreezeAssetArgs.description:
Arguments required to Disallow further unprivileged transfers for the asset class.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be frozen.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsThawAssetArgs.description:
Arguments required to Allow unprivileged transfers for the asset again.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to be thawed.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to be thawed.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsTransferOwnershipArgs.description:
Arguments required to Change the Owner of an asset.

`id` - The identifier of the asset.

`owner` - The new Owner of this asset.

owner.description: The new Owner of this asset.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

BlockchainGenericText.description:
Text or metadata represented by string.
Characters limit is defined in `StringLimit` const on blockchain.

AssetsSetMetadataArgs.description:
Arguments required to Set the raw metadata for an asset.

`id` - The identifier of the asset to update.

`data` - The data of metadata. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

id.description: The identifier of the asset to update.

data.description: The data of metadata. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AssetsSetMinBalanceArgs.description:
Arguments required to Sets the minimum balance of an asset.

`id` - The identifier of the asset.

`minBalance` - The new value of `min_balance`.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed
The type of transaction to be performed

NftsDestroyCollectionArgs.description:
Arguments required to Destroy a collection of fungible items.

`collection` - The identifier of the collection to be destroyed.

`witness` - Information on the items minted in the collection. This must be correct.

collection.description: The identifier of the collection to be destroyed.

witness.description: Information on the items minted in the collection. This must be correct.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed
The type of transaction to be performed

NftsBurnItemArgs.description:
Arguments required to Destroy a single item.

`collection` - The collection of the item to be burned.

`item` - The item to be burned.

collection.description: The collection of the item to be burned.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsTransferItemArgs.description:
Arguments required to Move an item from the sender account to another.

`collection` - The collection of the item to be transferred.

`item` - The item to be transferred.

`dest` - The account to receive ownership of the item.

collection.description: The collection of the item to be transferred.

dest.description: The account to receive ownership of the item.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsLockItemTransferArgs.description:
Arguments required to Disallow further unprivileged transfer of an item.

`collection` - The collection of the item to be changed.

`item` - The item to become non-transferable.

collection.description: The collection of the item to be changed.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsUnlockItemTransferArgs.description:
Arguments required to Re-allow unprivileged transfer of an item.

`collection` - The collection of the item to be changed.

`item` - The item to become transferable.

collection.description: The collection of the item to be changed.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsTransferCollectionOwnershipArgs.description:
Arguments required to Change the Owner of a collection.

`collection` - The collection whose owner should be changed.

`newOwner`

collection.description: The collection whose owner should be changed.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsSetItemMetadataArgs.description:
Arguments required to Set the metadata for an item.

`collection` - The identifier of the collection whose item's metadata to set.

`item` - The identifier of the item whose metadata to set.

`data` - The general information of this item. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

collection.description: The identifier of the collection whose item's metadata to set.

item.description: The identifier of the item whose metadata to set.

data.description: The general information of this item. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsClearItemMetadataArgs.description:
Arguments required to Clear the metadata for an item.

`collection` - The identifier of the collection whose item's metadata to clear.

`item` - The identifier of the item whose metadata to clear.

collection.description: The identifier of the collection whose item's metadata to clear.

item.description: The identifier of the item whose metadata to clear.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsSetCollectionMetadataArgs.description:
Arguments required to Set the metadata for a collection.

`collection` - The identifier of the item whose metadata to update.

`data` - The general information of this item. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

collection.description: The identifier of the item whose metadata to update.

data.description: The general information of this item. Limited in length by `StringLimit`.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsClearCollectionMetadataArgs.description:
Arguments required to Clear the metadata for a collection.

`collection` - The identifier of the collection whose metadata to clear.

collection.description: The identifier of the collection whose metadata to clear.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

NftsAcceptCollectionOwnershipArgs.description:
Arguments required to Set (or reset) the acceptance of ownership for a particular account.

`maybeCollection` - The identifier of the collection whose ownership the signer is willing to accept, or if `None`, an indication that the signer is willing to accept no ownership transferal.

maybeCollection.description: The identifier of the collection whose ownership the signer is willing to accept, or if `None`, an indication that the signer is willing to accept no ownership transferal.

actionType.description: The type of transaction to be performed

AppAgentId.description: The ID of the application agent.

AppAgentAddress.description: The address of the application agent.

TransactionalAddressId.description: The ID of the transactional address.

NamedAddressName.description: The name of the named address.

CTActionOrigin.description: The origin type for each Action in CT

CTActionCall.description: Action call presented as object, or string encoded method (with arguments) in hex.

CTAction.description:
Represents an action in a clearing transaction.
[WARNING]: this is not a correct type, because `openapi v3` doesn't support `tuple` type.
The correct tuple type is [CTActionOrigin, CTActionCall], commented below

CTAtomicActions.description: A nested array of actions (Vec<Vec<Action>> in rust).

`appAgentId`

`atomics`

info.title: @traittech/actiongate
info.description: The app provides a convenient REST API to submit new transactions to the TRAIT blockchain.
